name: Muertos- An Aztec Afterlife Adventure
description:
You are a lost undead wandering the Aztec afterlife, only to come across a strange city. Within that city you are given a choice: confront the Lord of the Dead and pass onto the true afterlife, or have your soul eventually leave your body and leave you a wandering husk for eternity. Doesn't sound like a great fate, does it?

In order to find your way out of the strange Mitclan City, you'll have to investigate your surroundings thoroughly, finding odd and unique locations and characters. 

You only have until morning to find your way to the true afterlife- can you make it out with your soul intact?
